00007 class IntImpl extends DatumImpl implements Int {
00008     private long value;

00010     protected IntImpl(PureFactory factory, long value) {
00011         super(factory);
00012         this.value = value;
00013     }
00014 
00015     /* Interface */
00016     public long intValue() {
00017         return value;
00018     }

00020     public Int plus(Int n) {
00021         return new IntImpl(factory, value + n.intValue());
00022     }
00023     public Int minus(Int n) {
00024         return new IntImpl(factory, value - n.intValue());
00025     }
00026     public Int monus(Int n) {
00027         if (n.intValue() < value)
00028             return new IntImpl(factory, value - n.intValue());
00029         return new IntImpl(factory, 0);
00030     }
00031     public Int times(Int n) {
00032         return new IntImpl(factory, value * n.intValue());
00033     }

00047             return factory.makeEmpty();
00048         throw new Exceptional(factory.makeEmpty());
00049     }
00050     public Empty lessOrEq(Int n) throws Exceptional {
